channel.title: Courses on PG-EAM - Graduate Program in Aeronautical and Mechanical Engineering
channel.description: Recent content in Courses on PG-EAM - Graduate Program in Aeronautical and Mechanical Engineering

item.title: EAM-1: Aircraft Design, Structures and Aerospace Systems
item.description:
This area covers aerodynamics, flight dynamics, structures, control and aircraft design.

Code Course Title Credits
AA-203 Subsonic Experimental Aerodynamics 3
AA-204 Wind Turbine and Rotary Wing Aerodynamics 3

item.title: EAM-2: Aerospace Propulsion and Energy
item.description:
This area focuses on propulsion, combustion, fluid mechanics and thermal systems.

Code Course Title Credits
AC-240 Heat Conduction: A Numerical Approach 3
AC-250 Introduction to Data Acquisition 3
AC-251 Propellers 3
AC-285 Elements of Combustion 3
AC-292 Pollutant Emissions in Combustion Processes 3

ME-256 Turbulent Flow in Clean and Porous Media 3
ME-278 Refrigeration and Air Conditioning 3

item.title: EAM-3: Materials, Manufacturing and Automation
item.description:
This area encompasses advanced materials (polymers, metals, ceramics), manufacturing processes and applied chemistry.
